name: sendIntention

action.description: The action to be signed and sent. This includes the operation to be performed, such as transferring or swapping tokens. Example values: 'Transfer 1 ETH to alice.eth on Ethereum'. 'Swap 0.5 ETH for USDC on Optimism'. 'Transfer 100 ARB to 0x02C0D734EFdA6a689375933d8EeCC89Ed94687a2 on Arbitrum'.

description: This function allows the AI assistant to create an intention object to be signed and sent to the Oya protocol bundler server for execution on Oya's virtual chain. For now, you can display the object to the account holder for confirmation.
